titles.title: Central Valley Judicial Relief Act of 2013
To provide for additional Federal district judgeships for the eastern district of California, and for other purposes.
Central Valley Judicial Relief Act of 2013

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary:
Central Valley Judicial Relief Act of 2013 - Directs the President to appoint, with advice and consent of the Senate, six additional district judges for the eastern district of California and one temporary judgeship for such district.
Makes Bakersfield an additional place of holding court for the eastern district.
